technologies.sizing_formula: Aeration Tank Volume (m³) = Q × HRT; MLSS = 3000 mg/L; SRT = 10–20 days
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 20–30 L/m²/h

technologies.notes: Compact design for high FOG removal
technologies.sizing_formula: Surface Area (m²) = Q / Surface Loading Rate; Rate = 5–10 m³/m²/h
Reactor Volume (m³) = Q × HRT; HRT = 8–12 h
Filter Volume (m³) = Q × HRT; HRT = 2–6 h
Reactor Volume (m³) = Q × HRT; HRT = 6–8 h
Carbon Volume (m³) = Q × EBCT; EBCT = 10–20 min
Ozone Dose (mg/L) × Q = g/h ozone required
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 15–25 L/m²/h
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 15–25 L/m²/h
Electrode Area (m²) = Q / Current Density; Current Density = 1–10 mA/cm²
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 40–60 L/m²/h
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 20–40 L/m²/h
Lamp Power (W) = Dose (mJ/cm²) × Q
Chlorine Dose (mg/L) × Q = kg/day chlorine required
Reactor Volume (m³) = Q × HRT; HRT = 4–6 h
Area (m²) = Q / Loading Rate; Loading = 5–10 m³/m²/d
Ozone/H₂O₂ Dose (mg/L) × Q = kg/day chemical required
Resin Volume (m³) = Q × EBCT; EBCT = 5–10 min
Membrane Area (m²) = Q / Flux; Flux = 50–100 L/m²/h
